segments.text: Those kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without their mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting eagerly for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was a kid, trying to get treats without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, and I'm worried the boy might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, which makes me even more nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope their mom doesn't catch them, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how focused they are on the cookies, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies are in that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my childhood, full of little adventures and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
